answers.answer: Thanks...i hope so. ):  still waiting for a bed

question: So i just got out of my appointment. BP was 142/80. The nurse didn't even let me sit there and relax for a few min before checking,  and she didnt attempt to check it again. So dr does his thing,  not dialated, checks if head is down blah. Then says "ok im going to send you to triage so they can monitor and do some blood work to check for preeclampsia. " now mind you in in NeoNatal stress testing twice a week and BP is always PERFECT!  100/60 or 110/70 ect. So i get to triage and there are no beds available? ! :(  so now im waiting for a bed to open up a im just stressed!  ):  sorry just needed to rant
title: ugh rant!! long sorry...
